text: Sutaram ye byakti allaha sambandhe mithya ratana kare kimba tamra ayatasamuhe mithyaropa kare tara ceye bara yalima ara ke? Tadera jan'ya ye ansa lekha ache ta tadera kache paumchabe [1]. Abasese yakhana amadera phirisatagana tadera jana kabajera jan'ya tadera kache asabe, takhana tara jijnesa karabe, ‘allaha chara yaderake tomara dakate [2] tara kothaya?' Tara balabe, ‘tara amadera theke udha'o hayeche’ ebam tara nijedera bipakse saksya debe ye, niscaya tara kaphera chila
